channel.title: Home on Demo Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Demo Hugo Site

item.title: Typography
item.description: Typeface Bula's uses the open-source typface Nunito Sans. Nunito Sans can be downloaded from the official Google Fonts library. Nunito Sans 400 Nunito Sans 600 Nunito Sans 700 Size Body has a variety of sizes available with text-body-01 which will display content at the base font size. Pure Fiji brings you the best of these ancient traditions combined with advanced technology for today's natural body care. Pure Fiji brings you the best of these ancient traditions combined with advanced technology for today's natural body care.

item.title: Badge
item.description: Table of definitions The visual appearance is set using one of the following classes: pf-badge-new, pf-badge-sale, pf-badge-fav, or pf-badge-promo Class Description pf-badge The default internal sizing and structure of the badge. The default badge text colour is white. pf-badge-secondary Changes the default shape from circular to a pill-shape.

item.title: Accordion
item.description: Default Click the accordions below to expand/collapse the accordion content. Benefits Absorbs quickly and keeps skin hydrated, nourished and soft  High in anti-oxidants, vitamins A,B,C,E, Omega 3,6,7 and 9 Key Ingredients Cold pressed virgin coconut oil, macadamia, dilo and sikeci oil. Passionflower extracts and fresh coconut milk. How to Use As a body moisturiser or for extra dry areas.
